item.title: Utorrent
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:4, topic:414561”]Why are you posting something not even related to private servers in the server help?

Why don’t you go contact torrent?

THERE IS NO PORTFORWARDING WITH UTORRENT.

All torrent is:
A simple download client, example: you download utorrent, that allows you to visit sites that host torrent downloads.

Big search engine for utorrent downloads.
http://www.utorrentz.eu[/quote]
you guys are idiots, you can portforward USING uTorrent…
and his isn’t 192.168.1.1 it’s 192.168.2._
but im guessing 192.168.1.1 is the best answer, works universally.

OT: If you get a router login page, your 1 step further. Now you just gotta log in, and portforward.

Read full topic
